actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-810.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 221 - 176.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 562) making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the Department of Labor for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J. Res. 562 (Department of Labor, Supplemental appropriation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 562) making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the Department of Labor for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982.
